title: Completed a mission but didnt get the mission reward
body: The final project mission, winning a game on SR before 33 min. I completed it in 32:54 yet the mission still says 0/1 games and i have not received the emote.

replies.body: I gotchu fam. Looks like there's a weird kind of bug where the timer keeps ticking on the victory screen adding just enough time to push you over 33 min. The actual game time still records and I saw you were right around 32:50, so you should find the mission completed now ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=133boPhN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-29T05:38:12.363+0000)
>
> I gotchu fam. Looks like there's a weird kind of bug where the timer keeps ticking on the victory screen adding just enough time to push you over 33 min. The actual game time still records and I saw you were right around 32:50, so you should find the mission completed now ^_^

No sir it still says incomplete and the emote is not in my inventory
Strange, added it personally to your account as soon as I replied and it was in your inventory on our end before you responded. Glad you finally found it!
got it now from another game
Did you have a Project Icon equipped? That might be why you didn't complete the mission.

> [{quoted}](name=SteveTheMiner,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=133boPhN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-29T02:01:52.451+0000)
>
> Did you have a Project Icon equipped? That might be why you didn't complete the mission.

Yeah its been equipped the whole time, thats how i got to the final mission.
